Bash(git -C "F:/web-clients/joseph-sardella/jpsrealtor" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Insights Page Redesign: AI-Powered Search & Modern Components

Complete redesign of /insights page with AI search capabilities:

## New Components:
- AISearchBar: Natural language search with AI sparkle icon
- ArticleAccordion: Expandable article cards with thumbnails
- FilterTabs: AI Suggestions, Categories, Date, Topics
- CategoryFilter: Visual category selection with counts
- DateFilter: Year/month filtering with quick filters
- TopicCloud: Auto-generated topic tags with color coding

## New API Endpoints:
- POST /api/articles/ai-search: AI-powered article search with Groq
- GET /api/articles/topics: Auto-generate topic cloud from keywords
- GET /api/articles/list: List all published articles

## Features:
- Natural language search (e.g., "articles about Palm Desert homes")
- AI intent extraction and relevance ranking
- Search term highlighting in results
- Multiple filter modes with smooth tab transitions
- Mobile-responsive design
- Theme-aware styling (light/dark)

## Bug Fixes:
- Fixed mobile padding on article pages (hamburger menu overlap)
- SEO description validation changed to warning at 300+ chars
- Category/section frontmatter mapping verified

## CMS Enhancements:
- Draft support with frontmatter flag
- Save as Draft button (orange)
- Auto-deploy to production via git push
- Tags system removed (simplified to categories only)
- Category dropdown repositioned for better UX

 Generated with Claude Code
https://claude.com/claude-code

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
